radiographic_examinations.findings: Area of hyperfunctioning tissue corresponding to the location of the palpable abnormality.
Uptake in the thyroid bed only.
Same focus of uptake noted in the diagnostic whole-body scan.
Slightly elevated uptake in a heterogeneous pattern.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Nodule increased from 1.2 cm to 2.1 cm in diameter over 11 years.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT and MRI of the neck, chest, abdomen, and pelvis
radiographic_examinations.findings: Excluded the possibility of metastasis from a primary nonthyroidal malignancy.
Only 131I uptake was found in the thyroid bed.
Revealed uptake in the thyroid bed area only.
